description: It's purpose is to retrieve username/password credentials for GIT from KeePass password store using plugin KeePassCommander.

installer.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Copy-Item "$dir\git-credential-keepasscommand*" "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\" -Force; $e = "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\git-credential-keepasscommand.exe";$e = $e -replace "\\","/"; git config --global credential.helper $e; KeePass

uninstaller.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Get-Item "$dir\git-credential-keepasscommand*" | Foreach-Object { Remove-Item $( $_.FullName -replace [regex]::Escape($dir), "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins" ) -Force };git config --global --unset credential.helper; KeePass
